name: Cloud Knight Lieutenant: Yanqing (Illusion)
description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age. This entity is a phantom borne from your memories.

skills.name: Rapturous Wind
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, and causes all Flying Swords (Illusion) to carry out Follow-up ATKs that deal extra DMG.

skills.name: Swallow Return
skills.description: Summons 4 Flying Swords (Illusion) and gains the Sword Formation effect that increases this unit's SPD. Flying Swords (Illusion) can only be destroyed once they are Weakness Broken, and their Weaknesses will be transferred to the remaining Flying Swords. After inflicting Weakness Break on all Flying Swords (Illusion), the Sword Formation effect will be dispelled.

skills.name: Ironthorn
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Ballad of Formation Breaker
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Qi Advance
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Cast Cascading Laceration on all targets in the next action.

skills.name: Cascading Laceration
skills.description: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Qi Converge
skills.description: Locks on to a single target. After 2 turns, use Aethereal Dreamflux on the target.

skills.name: Aethereal Dreamflux
skills.description: Continuously deals massive Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Shadowless Sword Swirl
skills.description: All attacks from Yanqing and his Flying Swords (Illusion) inflict the Frostthorn state on the attacked targets, increasing Ice DMG received.

skills.name: Swallow Return
skills.description: Summons 4 Flying Swords (Illusion) and gains the Sword Formation effect that increases this unit's SPD. The Flying Swords' Weaknesses will be hidden initially and are revealed once they are attacked by the correct DMG type. Flying Swords (Illusion) can only be destroyed once they are Weakness Broken, and their Weaknesses will be transferred to the remaining Flying Swords. After inflicting Weakness Break on all Flying Swords (Illusion), the Sword Formation effect will be dispelled.
